Package angryflappybird

Class Blob

java.lang.Object
angryflappybird.Sprite
angryflappybird.Blob
public class Blob extends Sprite
The blob class is a child class of the sprite class. It is responsible for defining the blob properties

    • intersectsPig

      public boolean intersectsPig(Sprite pig)
      Parameters:
      pig -
      Returns:
      True if the pig intersects the blob intersectsPig checks for an intersection of the blob with the pig. It returns true if there is an intersection. False otherwise

    • intersectsSprite

      public boolean intersectsSprite(Sprite e)
      Overrides:
      intersectsSprite in class Sprite
      Parameters:
      Sprite -
      Returns:
      boolean intersectsSprite checks for an intersection of the blob with the another sprite(e.g pipes, egg). It returns true if there is an intersection. False otherwise
